net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics.Camera

    Package Description
    net.alevel.asteroids.engine

    • Uses of Camera in net.alevel.asteroids.engine

      Methods in net.alevel.asteroids.engine that return types with arguments of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pair<Camera,List<GameObject>> ILogic.toRender()
      Tells the renderer what to render and also passes the camera to use

    • Uses of Camera in net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics

      Methods in net.alevel.asteroids.engine.graphics with parameters of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.joml.Matrix4f Transformations.getViewMatrix(Camera camera)
      This gets the camera's rotation and position vectors as a matrix that can applied to mesh vertices.
      The camera in a simulation is always at position (0,0,0) and rotation (0,0,0).
      E.g.
      void Renderer.render(Window window, Camera camera, List<GameObject> gameObjects)
      Renders all the renderable objects.
